data.enText: a situation which makes problems, often one in which you have to make a very difficult choice between things of equal importance

data.id-g-sent: on the horns of a dilemma

simple_means.memory_skill: di 二，两 + lemma 争论 → 争论有两种 → 进退两难

ex.chText: 对于是否应邀参加聚会他左右为难。
ex.enText: He was in a dilemma about the party invitation.

ex.chText: 她正面临着选择结婚还是出国留学的两难境地。
ex.enText: She is faced with the dilemma of choosing between marriage and studying abroad.

synonyms.bx: 指进退两难、难以抉择的境地。

ex.chText: 政府决定给经济上遇到困难的公司提供帮助。
ex.enText: The government has decided to provide help to companies with financial difficulties.

ex.chText: 他的公司因债务问题已面临困境。
ex.enText: His business has faced difficulty with debt.
She helped him out of trouble.

ex.chText: 一艘驳船在非洲沿海遇险。
ex.enText: A barge got into trouble off the coast of Africa.

synonyms.bx: 指可能招致批评或惩罚的困难或危险处境。

data.enText: on the horns of a dilemma
in a situation in which you have to make a choice between things that are equally unpleasant

tr: state of uncertainty or perplexity especially as requiring a choice between equally unfavorable options

value.def: A dilemma is a difficult situation in which you have to choose between two or more alternatives.

example.ex: He was faced with the dilemma of whether or not to return to his country...
example.tran: 要不要回国，他进退两难。

example.ex: The issue raises a moral dilemma.
example.tran: 这个问题引发了一个道德上的两难抉择。

partsOfSpeech.dec: di 两个 + lemma 争论 → 两种争论 → 进退两难
di 二，两 + lapid 石头 + ate 使… →〔造房的〕石头一分为二 → 倒塌
di 二，两 + lemma 争论 → 争论有两种 → 进退两难
di 二，两 + ox 氧 + ide 化合物 → 二氧化物
di 使…分开，离开 + gest 带来 → 带下去 → 消化 → 经过消化后的精华 → 文摘
di 使…分开，离开 + gest 带来 → 带下去 → 消化
di 使…分开，离开 + gress 走 → 离开〔话题〕→ 离题
di 使…分开，离开 + lat 放 + e → 分开放 → 膨胀
di 使…分开，离开 + lut 冲洗 + e →〔用水〕冲洗使分开 → 冲淡
di 使…分开，离开 + vert 转 → 转开 → 转向
di 使…分开，离开 + vest 衣服 → 衣服与身体分离 → 脱去
di 使…分开，离开 + vid 分开 + e → 分开
di 使…分开，离开 + vorc〔 = vert转〕+ e → 从〔丈夫〕身边转开 → 离婚
